name: The Longest Road
description:
Longest Road is a creepy puzzle adventure game created by myself, Louis Edbrooke. It has an achromatic style and a creepy feel. Combining this theme with a choice-based storyline creates an unforgettable experience.


Controls

Movement - WASD

Jump - Spacebar

Sprint - Shift

Interact - E

Shoot - F


Credits

Art, Animation & Programming: Louis Edbrooke

Music: Nathan Hanover


Install instructions
  1. Create a folder somewhere, preferably titled "TheLongestRoad"
  2. Extract the contents of "TheLongestRoad.zip" into the folder you created.
  3. With LongestRoad_DATA and LongestRoad.exe in the same directory
  4. You can also create a shortcut to LongestRoad.exe to make it easier to access.
